social_posts.post_text:
Got to witness 9 sea turtles making their way back home after being cared for and rehabilitated by the @seaturtlehospital what an incredible experience!

#savetheturtles #seaturtle #seaturtles #karenbeasleyseaturtlehospital #beachlife #coastalliving

Working on some accelerative strength (.5 - .75 meters per second) through the top end of the dead lift with @perch.fit #velocitybasedtraining and a banded rack pull set up. 

Rack pull position is a great way to overload the top end of the deadlift and help the athlete acclimate to various loads. 

Why bands? 
1️⃣One of the biggest faults of athletes is “being lazy” with the application of force. Meaning the lifter only applies the minimum amount of force required to overcome the external resistance. Where instead, athletes and lifters should be developing the habit of applying maximal force at all times. 
2️⃣If you struggle to lock the weight out, the banded deadlift will allow you to have greater resistance in the exact range of motion required to build strength.
3️⃣Using a band while deadlifting can provide an external cue to keep you in the correct bar path and positioning.

Banded rack pull paired with the technology of @perch.fit #velocitybasedtraining is the perfect pair for training acceleration where it’s needed! 

#changethegame #gamechanger #fit #fitness #athlete #bodybuilding #lifting #hustle #grind #sportsperformance #fitfam #strength #strengthtraining #wilmingtonnc #wilmingtonfitness

EXCITING NEWS!

I am so HAPPY to announce that I have joined The Castro Real Estate Team- Coldwell Banker Sea Coast Advantage! It is truly a blessing to be apart of this amazing team, surrounded by amazing support. Thank you all for following me on this journey and supporting me during one of the biggest changes of my life! 

As a former personal trainer and nutrition coach, I have always had a passion for helping others and changing lives. I look forward to continuing that through Real Estate! Changing lives and filling hearts! If you need the services of a Real Estate Professional, look no further and If you know anyone looking to buy or sell, send them my way! 🏡🔑

#realestate #realtor #ncrealestate #ncrealtor #castrorealestateteam #coldwellbanker

💥Coming Soon!!!! 💥 1224 S Shore Drive, Surf City - Ocean Front!!!!! 3 bed / 3 Ba / 2400 Sq Ft / direct ocean access / one-owner home! 

Price: $1,500,000 

✨This is your chance to own a 2400 sq foot home nestled right on the sandy shores of Surf City!

Nestled along the Surf City dunes, this 3-bed + flex, beach home showcases a captivating exterior that exudes coastal charm. With its soft color palette and tasteful coastal accents, the 2400 sq ft, 3-bed home seamlessly blends into the coastal landscape just one mile from the excitement of downtown Surf City. Upon entering the home, you are greeted with immediate views of the Atlantic Ocean, a beautifully remodeled living room with a stone fireplace, built-in shelving, and expansive thermal doors that fill the interior with natural light while providing uninterrupted views of the sea. 

The open floor plan flows right into the dining room and ample kitchen space for entertaining.  Whether you're lounging in the living room, preparing meals on the kitchen island with built-in sink, or on your second-floor balcony, the mesmerizing ocean views will always be within sight. 

The master bedroom is a key feature of this home with another large fireplace, ample space, a large walk-in closet, a private balcony and a beautifully updated en suite bath with double sinks and a jacuzzi tub, and its own views of the ocean. Across the second-floor landing, you will find the laundry nook, a coffee/wine bar and an additional porch, perfect for viewing fireworks, curling up with a good book or just enjoying the sunset from the Intracoastal side of the home. 

This beautiful home also boasts LVP flooring throughout the entire home, an expansive deck leading out to the sand, a whole home generator that conveys with the property, an outdoor faucet primed for an outdoor shower, a wrap-around garage for your cars, kayaks and golf carts AND has only had one owner, and never used as a short-term rental.

Showings to start in a few short weeks. 

#topsailisland #topsailbeach #surfcitync #beachhome #beachfront #oceanfrontproperty #coastalcarolina #coast

Just Listed in 📍Sneads Ferry!
202 𝘑 𝘉𝘦𝘭𝘵𝘰𝘯 𝘊𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘵, 𝘚𝘯𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘴 𝘍𝘦𝘳𝘳𝘺, 𝘕𝘊 28460
4 𝘣𝘦𝘥𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘮𝘴 | 3 𝘣𝘢𝘵𝘩𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘮𝘴 | 2,382 𝘴𝘲𝘧𝘵
Listed at $374,900 💰

Welcome to J Belton Court 🏡 located in the desirable neighborhood of 𝙊𝙡𝙙 𝘿𝙤𝙘𝙠 𝙋𝙡𝙖𝙣𝙩𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣 with an attached 2-car 🚗 garage, and a covered front porch. This home is conveniently located just minutes away from North Topsail Beach 🏖, New River Air Station Stone Bay, and the back gate to Camp Lejeune. 🇺🇸 
The exterior of the property features a huge, 𝙛𝙪𝙡𝙡𝙮 𝙛𝙚𝙣𝙘𝙚𝙙 𝙞𝙣 𝙗𝙖𝙘𝙠𝙮𝙖𝙧𝙙🌳 with a 𝙥𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤 and a 𝙛𝙞𝙧𝙚 𝙥𝙞𝙩 🔥 and is the perfect spot to enjoy a nice day or entertain guests.☀️ 
As you enter the home, you are welcomed by the gorgeous ✨ entryway with 𝙬𝙖𝙞𝙣𝙩𝙨𝙘𝙤𝙩 𝙬𝙖𝙡𝙡𝙨 and a formal dining room to your right. The half bathroom 🛁 showcases a 𝙗𝙚𝙖𝙪𝙩𝙞𝙛𝙪𝙡 𝙗𝙧𝙞𝙘𝙠, 𝙖𝙘𝙘𝙚𝙣𝙩 𝙬𝙖𝙡𝙡. The kitchen and living area offer an open concept with plenty of natural light. ☀️ The kitchen is a chef's delight and includes a pantry, a huge magnet chalkboard 🖍 wall, 𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙩𝙚 𝙘𝙤𝙪𝙣𝙩𝙚𝙧𝙩𝙤𝙥𝙨 with tile backsplash 💫, a kitchen island with a 𝙩𝙤𝙪𝙘𝙝𝙡𝙚𝙨𝙨 𝙛𝙖𝙪𝙘𝙚𝙩, and lots of storage space. 📦 
An additional feature to the downstairs of this home is the coat closet with a brick 🧱 accent wall as well. The wood flooring stairs lead you to the second level of the home where the large master suite 🛏 is located with a walk in master closet. 👔 The master bathroom 🛁 features 𝙇𝙑𝙋 𝙛𝙡𝙤𝙤𝙧𝙞𝙣𝙜, a 𝙨𝙤𝙖𝙠𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙩𝙪𝙗 🛁 with 𝙜𝙤𝙧𝙜𝙚𝙤𝙪𝙨 𝙩𝙞𝙡𝙚, a 𝙬𝙖𝙡𝙠 𝙞𝙣 𝙨𝙝𝙤𝙬𝙚𝙧 🚿, and a 𝙙𝙪𝙖𝙡 𝙨𝙞𝙣𝙠 𝙫𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙩𝙮 with additional shelving for storage. 

🏡J Belton Court has the perfect amount of charm and farmhouse 🚜 features, you do not want to miss this home. 𝙎𝙘𝙝𝙚𝙙𝙪𝙡𝙚 𝙮𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙥𝙧𝙞𝙫𝙖𝙩𝙚 𝙩𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙩𝙤𝙙𝙖𝙮!

#castroteam #sneadsferrync #sneadsferryncrealestate #sneadsferrynchomes #sneadsferryrealestate #homesforsale
